recipesJson.name: Hazel Milk
recipesJson.author: loudstarfish
recipesJson.description: Smooth creamy vape with a hint of hazelnut and vanilla. If you don't have Beignets, feel free to sub with INW Biscuit at 1-1.5%.

reviews.text: This deserves a five star rating simply for the creamy deliciousness the recipe provides. Very nice job! Iâ€™m loving the notes of vanilla and hazelnut as they combine perfectly into a vape that has gone on my ADV list!
